channel.title: Ok,sorry guys but its a very common problem but give it a look. and thx!
channel.description: :confused: Every time i go and try to make a server all i have problems with is when I try to compile it says "javac" is not recognized as an internal or external command" word-for-word and I download every JDK Every time but it still says it... Can any one help me?! It will be highly appreciated! Thank you guys Much Love!

item.title: Ok,sorry guys but its a very common problem but give it a look. and thx!

item.title: Ok,sorry guys but its a very common problem but give it a look. and thx!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

If i where you i would go to control pannel, add and remove programs then remove all your java software

Next go to java.com and download the JDK!!

Then it will do paths for you!!
Hope this helped
Johno

Read full topic

item.title: Ok,sorry guys but its a very common problem but give it a look. and thx!
item.dc:creator: @Mattslone Mattslone
item.description:
@Mattslone wrote:

[quote=“myspaceman123, post:3, topic:269491”]do you want a good compiler?

@echo off title goodvbad compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]
do i erase all of ot the put it in there?

Read full topic
item.source: Ok,sorry guys but its a very common problem but give it a look. and thx!

@echo off title goodvbad compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
